p: Maximum yields of photosystem II (Fv/Fm) over time are presented in Figure 8. Chlorophyll fluorescence showed that most values were located between 0.80 and 0.85, implying that the trees maintained good ecophysiological performances throughout the experiment ( Figure 8). Two-way repeated measure ANOVA revealed a significant impact of factors (treatment: F = 4.759, p = 0.003, ges = 0.082; day: F = 4.782, p = 0.001, ges = 0.107) without interaction ( F = 1.59, p = 0.099, ges = 0.107). Pairwise comparison demonstrated significant differences only at day 1 between treatment ( Figure 8) and only for the control between 24 and 48 h and 24 and 96 h.
